snippet: A lawsuit says that if the rest of the St. Louis region generated revenue from its courts at the rate of Ferguson, Mo., it would have made nearly $1.3 billion in the past five years.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit says that if the rest of the St. Louis region generated revenue from its courts at the rate of Ferguson, Mo., it would have made nearly $1.3 billion in the past five years.

headline.main: Complaint Against Ferguson Over Jail Time for Traffic Tickets
